title: Stock Update: The Chubb Corporation (NYSE:CB) – Chubb Board Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend
content:
at 11:38 AM EDT [PR Newswire] – WARREN, N.J., Sept. 3, 2015 /PRNewswire/ — The Board of Directors of The Chubb Corporation (NYSE: CB) today declared a regular quarterly dividend in the amount of $0.57 per share . . . → Read More: Stock Update: The Chubb Corporation (NYSE:CB) – Chubb Board Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend Similar Articles: Stock Update (NYSE:BBT): BB&T announces common stock dividend Company Update (NYSE:DUK): Duke Energy declares quarterly dividend payment to shareholders Market Update: BB&T Corporation (NYSE:BBT) – BB&T announces 12.5-percent common stock dividend increase
